outputs.output_descr:
People have greater awareness of their rights and increased access to formal and informal justice redressal mechanisms. The activities that will be carried out are the following:
-Access to justice programme development. 
-Legal awareness raising in schools and rural areas; 
-Strengthening alternative dispute resolution mechanisms.

project_descr: Contributing to people's access to justice in Bhutan through raising awareness of rights and responsibilities and increasing access to formal and informal justice mechanisms.
